author: kmalhi
msg: According to the spec "If the stateless session bean instance has an ejbCreate method, the container treats the ejbCreatemethod as the instance’s PostConstruct method, and, in this case, the PostConstruct annotation (or deployment descriptor metadata) can only be applied to the bean’s ejbCreate method."
Fixed CheckCallbacks to reflect the above and also updated the test.
